BOT:
Hi there!
I’m the personal bot of Kevin, a Growth Hacker from Silicon Valley.
![kevin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kevinelgan/kevin-bot/master/img/kevin.jpg)
Want to know more about bots or learn about Kevin? %[I'm here for the bot](postback:here_for_the_bot) %[Learn about Kevin](postback:learn_about_kevin) %[One random fact!](postback:random_fact)
LEARN ABOUT KEVIN: I can tell you a lot of things about Kevin. What are you interested in learning about? %[Background](postback:BACKGROUND) %[Education](postback:EDUCATION) %[Work Experience](postback:WORK_EXPERIENCE)
BACKGROUND:
Kevin was born in California where he spent his early childhood living in Los Angeles and Santa Barbara. Most of his adolescence was spent growing up in New York.
As a kid, Kevin was very active with tons of different interests. He loved playing with experimental tech products, learning to code, playing musical instruments and competing in martial arts tournaments. %[More about tech](postback:MORE_ABOUT_TECH) %[More about music](postback:MORE_ABOUT_MUSIC) %[More about martial arts](postback:MORE_ABOUT_MARTIAL_ARTS) %[Other topics](postback:TOPICS)
MORE ABOUT TECH:
Kevin was introduced to technology through his dad, a prominent tech journalist who was editor of Windows Magazine.
Kevin spent countless hours playing with and testing state-of-the-art and pre-release products in the Windows Magazine “Lab”.
His interest in technology eventually led him to teaching himself to code in multiple languages. %[More about music](postback:MORE_ABOUT_MUSIC) %[More about martial arts](postback:MORE_ABOUT_MARTIAL_ARTS) %[Other topics](postback:TOPICS)
MORE ABOUT MUSIC:
Kevin was very involved with music as a child. He played classical piano from a young age, alto sax in marching band, bari sax in a traveling jazz band and jazz flute.
Just kidding about the jazz flute.
;) %[More about martial arts](postback:MORE_ABOUT_MARTIAL_ARTS) %[Other topics](postback:TOPICS)
MORE ABOUT MARTIAL ARTS:
Martial arts were a major influence on Kevin.
Inspired by the Karate Kid movies, he pursued martial arts relentlessly. He is a 2nd degree black belt in Tae Kwon Do and a 1st degree black belt in Shotokan Karate.
Kevin has trained under two different world champions, leading him to become a two-time national champion in forms and fighting in NASKA. %[Other topics](postback:TOPICS)
EDUCATION:
Graduating from one of the top high schools in the country, he decided to attend the United States Naval Academy where he studied computer science and political science.
Academics always came easily to Kevin, so he started traveling the world and learning languages. %[Degrees](postback:DEGREES) %[What languages?](postback:LANGUAGES) %[Travel](postback:TRAVEL)
DEGREES: He got his undergrad in Political Science with an emphasis on International Relations. He also completed an Arabic language certificate at the International Language Institute in Cairo, Egypt. %[What languages?](postback:LANGUAGES) %[Travel](postback:TRAVEL) %[Other topics](postback:TOPICS)
LANGUAGES: Kevin moved to central america to teach himself Spanish and spent several months taking an Arabic immersion course while living in Cairo, Egypt. %[Where has he traveled](postback:TRAVEL) %[Other topics](postback:TOPICS)
TRAVEL: Kevin loves traveling and experiencing other cultures. He’s traveled to 34 countries with a special love for the Middle East. %[What countries?](postback:COUNTRY_LIST) %[What's his favorite country?](postback:FAVORITE_COUNTRY) %[Travel Highlights](postback:TRAVEL_HIGHLIGHTS) %[Other topics](postback:TOPICS)
COUNTRY_LIST: Still working on that... %[What's his favorite country?](postback:FAVORITE_COUNTRY) %[Travel Highlights](postback:TRAVEL_HIGHLIGHTS) %[Other topics](postback:TOPICS)
FAVORITE_COUNTRY:
Hard to say.
Cuba was quite magical and such a time capsule.
Egypt was also up there and so completely different than the western world. %[What countries?](postback:COUNTRY_LIST) %[What's his favorite country?](postback:FAVORITE_COUNTRY) %[Travel Highlights](postback:TRAVEL_HIGHLIGHTS) %[Other topics](postback:TOPICS)
TRAVEL HIGHLIGHTS: Getting married in Amman, Jordan was his definite travel highlight. %[Other topics](postback:TOPICS)
